<h1 align="center">
  Gilbert Solution's Remote Patient Monitor
</h1>

Welcome to our Remote Patient Monitor

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Install Node.js (v18 or newer)**

2.  **Install Git**

3.  **Install Gatsby Command Line Interface (CLI) (v5 or newer)**

    Run the following command below if on Windows to install the Gatsby CLI.

    ```shell
    npm install -g gatsby-cli
    ```

    If you're on a Mac you may have to run this instead.

    ```shell
    sudo npm install -g gatsby-cli
    ```

4.  **Install all dependencies**

    Run the following command to install all dependencies.

    ```shell
    npm install --force
    ```
5.  **Install Reactjs Chart 2**
    
    Run the following command to install Reactjs Chart 2.
    
    ```shell
    npm install --save chart.js react-chartjs-2
    ```
    
6.  **Start Developing**

    Run the following command to begin developing.

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

    The site should now be running at `http://localhost:8000`.

    If after the first time you try developing you get an error, you may need to clear the cache before trying again. This can be done using the following command.

    ```shell
    gatsby clean
    ```
